ygData.subject: Re: Humble youth seeking enlightenemt
ygData.msgSnippet: I received this information from a guild member who asked a GM.  I can t provide first hand info aside from that it seems to work with a full group. Perhaps
ygData.messageBody:
I received this information from a guild member who asked a GM. I can't
provide first hand info aside from that it seems to work with a full group.
Perhaps petition and ask them.


-----Original Message-----
From: David Rogers <derogers334@...>
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, May 20, 1999 1:12 PM
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Humble youth seeking enlightenemt


>From: David Rogers <derogers334@...>
>
>--- Jim Peterson <jim@...> wrote:
>> Actually, as verified by a GM, there is a 25% xp
>> bonus with a full group
>
>This is the first time I have heard anything to this effect, so could
>you please elaborate, and provide supporting evidence, commentary,
>quotes and such? I monitor three EQ related lists, plus two sites'
>boards, and read over a dozen EQ sites; so this statement comes as a
>complete surprise.
>
